brandHighlight.data: Bandit Wines was created by Charles Bieler and Joel Gott—who partnered in 2003 to bring their passion for great wine and their thirst for exploration together in a convenient, easy-to-tote package. Bandit’s design for Tetra Pak© make it an adventure-ready drink that stays fresh and uses natural resources responsibly. A proud supporter of the National Park Foundation, Bandit features custom illustrated images of America’s iconic National Parks on each package. #ExploreWithBandit

description.data: Bandit Chardonnay Wine is a rich, dry white wine that comes in an eco-friendly recyclable boxed wine. Silky smooth and full bodied, this white wine Chardonnay opens with rich, tropical fruit aromas, layered over a lush palate of ripe pear, juicy peaches and apples spiked with fresh citrus. Pair this wine with roasted chicken or creamy pasta. The Bandit Chardonnay underwent 40% malolactic fermentation to enhance aroma and mouthfeel; the remaining wine was kept non-malolactic to spotlight the fresh and fruity characteristics. Bandit California boxed wine comes in a lightweight container with a twist-to-open cap, so there's no need to worry about a corkscrew. The container reseals easily to keep the remaining wine fresh so you can enjoy it again later. This 500mL Tetra Pak of wine contains approximately three glasses of Chardonnay white wine. This dry wine has 13.6% alcohol by volume. A proud supporter of U.S. National Parks, Bandit features custom-illustrated images of America’s iconic National Parks on each of its varietals. Go Explore! Bandit Wines is a 1% for the Planet member and donates 1% of sales back to environmental nonprofits.

brandHighlight.data: Our timeless American story dates back three generations to when the Trinchero family left their home in New York City to pursue the American Dream in Napa Valley. The family purchased Sutter Home Winery in 1948, after the winery had been closed for almost 30 years due to Prohibition. Still family-owned, Sutter Home has a long history of delivering wine that people love, starting with the creation of the original White Zinfandel in the 1970s. Sutter Home is proud to be the brand generations of wine lovers trust to deliver consistent, award-winning quality and value for every wine occasion. We were honored to be awarded the Distinguished Service Award for “having introduced more Americans to wine on the table than anyone in history” from Wine Spectator. We will forever stand by our promise to create “a great product for a fair price.”

description.data: Sutter Home Rose Wine has a beautiful pink tone with elegant floral aromas. A hint of citrus on the nose leads to refreshing flavors of wild strawberries complemented by a crisp, refreshing finish. Sutter Home Wine has been awarded over 600 Gold medals since 2004. This blush California wine received 91 points, Gold - 2019 Los Angeles International and 90 points, Gold - 2019 West Coast Wine. Pair this pink wine with grilled pesto chicken, pizza Margherita or shrimp spring rolls. This wine features grapes sourced from California vineyards. Crisp and refreshing, this blush wine is cold-fermented and aged in stainless steel tanks to retain bright, fruity aromas. Presented in a wine bottle with a screw cap, this wine is convenient to open without a corkscrew. This bottled wine has 12.6% alcohol by volume. Sutter Home, family owned since 1948, is the brand generations of wine lovers trust to deliver consistent, award-winning quality and value for every wine occasion.

brandHighlight.data: For more than 30 years, Folie à Deux has crafted world-class wines that captivate the senses and evoke the nuances of the land. Today, we select our sustainably farmed grapes exclusively from Sonoma’s legendary appellations, where each variety thrives in the local terroir. Together, these wines embody an ideal fusion of grape variety and region, offering a glimpse of Sonoma’s extraordinarily diverse terroir, region by region, vineyard by vineyard. Join them on a journey through one of the world’s most coveted–yet accessible–wine destinations. This is Sonoma. Take a Sip.

description.data: Folie à Deux Zinfandel Red Wine is produced in the Dry Creek Valley of California. The Zinfandel wine opens with expressive bramble berry, blueberry, ripe strawberry, cocoa powder and black pepper, framed by hints of cherrywood smoke and clove aromas. Robust flavors of juicy, luscious berry and concentrated raspberry jam are accented with fig notes. Structured with velvety tannins, this Zinfandel has a filling palate and a soft, lingering finish. For an excellent pairing, serve this wine with braised pork topped with Sunday Gravy, smoked brisket or maple-glazed carrots. This bottle of wine has 15% alcohol by volume.

brandHighlight.data: Ménage à Trois originated as a blend of three red varietals, created in 1996 by two psychiatric professionals in St. Helena, California. Capturing wine lovers’ imagination through word of mouth, the offering was soon expanded to white and rosé blends as well. Ménage à Trois is credited with creating the Red Blend category and defining the domestic Super Premium Red Blend segment, elevating the brand to iconic status within the wine industry.

description.data: Wrap yourself in sweet splendor with Menage a Trois Sweet Collection Moscato White Wine. Fragrances of orange zest and honeysuckle lead to decadent flavors of ripe summer peaches and bright pineapple drenched in honey and orange blossoms. On the palate, delicate carbonation and a lively finish with crisp acidity lift the richness of this sweet Moscato wine. A touch of French Colombard adds zesty acidity and Chenin Blanc rounds out the flavor profile. This wine received 90 Points from the Tasting Panel in the April/May 2021 issue. The sweet wine blend pairs perfectly with cheese and vegetable platters. Sourced from grapes grown in the warm California sun, this wine undergoes a gentle wine making process with cold fermentation at 50 degrees Fahrenheit to maintain the rich, sweet flavors and aromas. This bottled wine has 9.5% alcohol by volume and comes in a screw cap wine bottle for easy opening without a corkscrew. Menage a Trois offers a robust portfolio of award-winning wines that consistently delight with a high-quality experience.

description.data: Bandit Pinot Grigio White Wine is a crisp, inviting dry white wine that comes in an eco-friendly recyclable boxed wine. This white wine was awarded "Best Buy" and 88 Points by Wine Enthusiast. Pair this white wine with everything from delicate dishes to fiery fare. To enhance the racy freshness of the California-sourced Sauvignon Blanc grape, Bandit uses stainless steel tanks to cold-ferment this wine at 55 degrees Fahrenheit to retain the fruity aromas and doesn't undergo a second malolactic fermentation to ensure crisp acidity. Bandit California white wine comes in a lightweight, environmentally friendly, portable container with a twist-to-open cap, so there's no need to worry about a corkscrew. It's an adventure-ready wine that stays fresh and uses natural resources responsibly. The boxed wine container reseals easily to keep the remaining wine fresh so you can enjoy it again later. brandHighlight.data: For more than 30 years, Folie à Deux has crafted world-class wines that captivate the senses and evoke the nuances of the land. Today, we select our sustainably farmed grapes exclusively from Sonoma’s legendary appellations, where each variety thrives in the local terroir. Together, these wines embody an ideal fusion of grape variety and region, offering a glimpse of Sonoma’s extraordinarily diverse terroir, region by region, vineyard by vineyard. Join them on a journey through one of the world’s most coveted–yet accessible–wine destinations. This is Sonoma. Take a Sip.

description.data: Folie a Deux Merlot Red Wine comes from the Alexander Valley, where warm days and cool evenings yield grapes with complex flavors and firm tannins. Blackberry, ripe cherries, dried fig and tea aromas with notes of tasty oak on the nose lead to vanilla, cherrywood smoke, chocolate and black raspberry flavors on the palate. This dry red wine is full-bodied and fleshy with balanced acidity and fine-grained cocoa powder tannins on the finish. This award-winning California Red Wine earned 90 Points from Wine Enthusiast in 2016, 92 points from James Suckling in 2017 and 91 Points from James Suckling in 2018. Folie a Deux red wine Merlot is the perfect complement to most meat dishes, such as Mediterranean lamb burgers or slow cooked roast beef. Folie a Deux wines are crafted to exude varietal character, while expressing the nuances of Sonoma County's iconic sub-appellations. Hand-picked grapes come from a selection of prime vineyards in the cooler parts of Alexander Valley. Nestled in northern Sonoma County, Alexander Valley AVA stretches 22 miles from Healdsburg to Cloverdale, following the meandering course of the Russian River. Following a 10 to 14 day maceration period, the lots are aged for 15 months in a combination of French, American and Hungarian oak barrels (17% new), showcasing the bright, varietally expressive palate of this Merlot wine. The result is a collection of wines that could only be made from Sonoma terroir. This bottled wine is 14% alcohol by volume. Folie a Deux wines are exclusively sourced from Sonoma appellations, where each variety thrives in local terroir. Sustainable farming and true-to-varietal wines evoke a sense of place and true Sonoma.

brandHighlight.data:
Solaia, which means the ‘sunny one’ in Italian, is a 50–acre southwest
facing vineyard that is contiguous to the Tignanello vineyard in Chianti Classico. The vineyard is planted 1,150–1,300 feet above sea level on stony,
calcareous soils of marl and friable alberese rock.

description.data: A ruby red color, 2016 Solaia distinguishes itself with aromatic notes of ripe dark fruit fused with sensations of aromatic herbs and mint; notes of chocolate alternate with spicy suggestions of white pepper. The palate of this red wine is rich with silky tannins. The finish is persistent and indicates optimal aging potential.

tastingNotesText.data:
Solaia is an intense ruby red in color. The nose offers intense notes of dark, ripe fruit; blueberries and black currants merge seamlessly with pleasant sensations of dried flowers and lavender, accompanied by delicate spicy notes of white pepper and balsamic notes of mint
and eucalyptus. Well-integrated aromas of white chocolate, cotton candy and dried fruit complete the rich bouquet of this red wine.

brandHighlight.data: Some say you can taste the history of a place in a glass of wine. Perhaps that’s why the wines of Montevina are brimming with such intense flavors and bold character. Spanish for “mountain vine,” Montevina brings a different altitude—and attitude—to its winemaking. Established in 1970 in the foothills of California’s rugged Sierra Nevada, historic Montevina was the region’s first post-Prohibition winery, resurrecting Amador County’s legendary wine industry. Since then, we’ve been known for crafting deeply flavored, robust wines that capture the unique character of this remarkable region. Our state-of-the art winery is spectacular, and features a spacious, friendly tasting room and a beautiful vineyard-ringed patio where you can relax with a glass of wine. There’s nothing quite like escaping to Amador wine country, at Montevina.

description.data: Aged in bourbon whiskey barrels for three months, Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Wine Blend has rich flavor with a long, lingering finish. Merlot, syrah, zinfandel, petite sirah, and cabernet sauvignon collide in one bourbon barrel to create this dark and jammy red blend wine that features bourbon-inspired flavors and aromas. This dark red wine garners its unique flavor from grape varietals found all across California's prime winegrowing regions. Crafted by Cellarmaster Jeff Kasavan, this California red wine bestows aromatic hints of fruit and toasty vanilla. Bourbon barrel aging gives this wine a soft, velvety mouthfeel with a subtle heat. Full-bodied and rich, this bold California wine is ideal for serving with steak and poultry, featuring at a wine and cheese party, or enjoying as a nightcap. In the spirit of breaking tradition, this handsomely boxed red wine gift set encourages friends to enjoy Cooper and Thief wine in the included pair of premium whiskey rocks glasses adorned with a gold, satin-etched logo. The artfully designed packaging also features a tasty seasonal recipe for pairing with this delicious red wine. Give the gift of rich, bold taste, stashing this unique set in a wine gift basket. For a devilishly good taste, store this 750 mL wine bottle at room temperature, but chill it before serving. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2022 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Acampo, CA

description.data: Cooper and Thief Tequila Barrel Aged Sauvignon Blanc White Wine fills the palate with memorable flavors derived from its unique aging process. This refreshing white wine starts out in scenic Napa Valley before being specially aged in a Casa Noble anejo oak tequila barrel for three months. The result is a rich vanilla flavor with hints of classic citrus and spice notes reminiscent of a fine, blue agave tequila. The freshness of this sauvignon blanc wine makes it a perfect partner in crime for light dishes like salad and seafood, as well as savory chicken entrees. Thanks to its barrel aged pedigree, this California white wine has an unusual richness to its structure, balancing refreshing acidity with a subtle heat similar to agave tequila. That all culminates in a smooth and lingering finish. To preserve its devilishly good taste, chill this white wine in for at least two hours before serving. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. © 2022 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Acampo, CA

brandHighlight.data: After 30 years of brewing award-winning craft beer, Odell Brewing is venturing into a new category with the launch of a wine project. Dedicated to the exploration of unique flavor profiles in the world of wine, this project was born out of the brewery’s shared passion for the art of winemaking. We are in pursuit of uniquely balanced flavors that showcase what a little beer-geek-turned-wine geek creativity can do. Unbound by geography, agriculture, or imagination, The OBC Wine Project is our fresh take on a centuries-old tradition.

description.data: Our sparkling rosé is all about texture. The medium-bodied, creamy rosé with notes of strawberries, cranberries, white peach and flowers explodes from the glass with a fine, bright carbonation. As the bubbles subside, the wine opens up with ripe citrus and apple on the palate. A lingering finish brings you back for another sip.

text.data: Crisp strawberry, white peach, rose petal
Sparkling Rose Wine

brandHighlight.data: After 30 years of brewing award-winning craft beer, Odell Brewing is venturing into a new category with the launch of a wine project. Dedicated to the exploration of unique flavor profiles in the world of wine, this project was born out of the brewery’s shared passion for the art of winemaking. We are in pursuit of uniquely balanced flavors that showcase what a little beer-geek-turned-wine geek creativity can do. Unbound by geography, agriculture, or imagination, The OBC Wine Project is our fresh take on a centuries-old tradition.

description.data: Our bright and zesty White Blend pours a pale, brilliant white. Bursting with aromas of grapefruit, lime zest, just-ripe peach, honeydew melon and wet stone, this wine leads with a bracing acidity, a lean midpalate with citrus and mineral notes, and a refreshing, mouthwatering finish.

text.data: Grapefruit, peach, citrus
White Wine
